data.meta_description: Ladies, it's almost time for our annual Glad Tidings Gathering where we will take part in a delicious catered dinner served by our men and enjoy a wonderful Christmas program. This year's theme is "Waiting for the Promise."  Tickets will go on sale Sunday, November 19 for $15 each
data.text: Ladies, it's almost time for our annual Glad Tidings Gathering where we will take part in a delicious catered dinner served by our men and enjoy a wonderful Christmas program. This year's theme is "Waiting for the Promise." Tickets will go on sale Sunday, November 19 for $15 each and can be purchased from Julie Bartholomew and Sharon Cutrell. Think now about who you can invite!
